titleStmt.title: The soules solace A sermon preached at the solemne funerall of William Favvcit gent. in the parish-church of West-ham in Essex, May 18. 1631. and since enlarged. By Edmund Layfielde Bachelour in Divinity, preacher of St Leonards-Bromley in Midlesex, by Stratford-bow.
titleStmt.author: Layfield, Edmund.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. F[lesher] for G. Gibbs, and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the Flowre-de-luce at the little south doore of St Pauls Church,

notesStmt.note: Several copies have date in imprint altered to read "1633".
Variant: title page has commas after "sermon" and after "funerall".
Identified as STC 15335 on UMI microfilm, reel 768.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Bodleian Library.
Appears at reel 768, ø (British Library copy), and at reel 1278, #6 (Bodleian Library copy).

place.placeName: his shop, at the signe of the Flowre-de-luce at the little south doore of St Pauls Church
